XmlWorldData.name: Filter Tutorial
XmlWorldData.description: This tutorial will show you how to use filters.

value.string: Этот урок научит тебя использовать фильтры.

XmlWorldData.creator: scoy

Step.GamepadText:
This tutorial will teach you how to use Filters in your programming. Filters allow you to be more specific about the things that your character senses.
Let's start with a simple case.
Step.MouseText:
This tutorial will teach you how to use Filters in your programming. Filters allow you to be more specific about the things that your character senses.
Let's start with a simple case.

value.string:
Этот урок научит тебя использовать фильтры в твоих программах. Фильтры позволят тебе конкретизировать действия персонажа.
Давай начнем с простого случая.

Step.TouchText:
This tutorial will teach you how to use Filters in your programming. Filters allow you to be more specific about the things that your character senses.
Let's start with a simple case.

Step.GamepadText:
We will start with a world that already has some objects in it. The world contains a Kodu <kodu> and several apples <apple> and rocks <rock>.
We're going to program Kodu <kodu> to move toward anything he sees.
Step.MouseText:
We will start with a world that already has some objects in it. The world contains a Kodu <kodu> and several apples <apple> and rocks <rock>.
We're going to program Kodu <kodu> to move toward anything he sees.

value.string:
Начнем с мира, на котором уже размещено несколько объектов. В мире находится Kodu <kodu>, а также несколько яблок <apple> и камней <rock>.
Нужно запрограммировать Kodu <kodu>, чтобы он двигался ко всему, что видит.

Step.TouchText:
We will start with a world that already has some objects in it. The world contains a Kodu <kodu> and several apples <apple> and rocks <rock>.
We're going to program Kodu <kodu> to move toward anything he sees.

Step.GamepadText: On the first row move the pencil cursor to the plus sign next to WHEN then press <a> to add <sensor.eyes>
Step.MouseText: On the first row click on the plus sign next to WHEN and add <sensor.eyes>

value.string: В первой строчке щелкни на знак ПЛЮС после КОГДА, и добавь <sensor.eyes>

Step.TouchText: On the first row tap on the plus sign next to WHEN and add <sensor.eyes>

Step.GamepadText: Now move the pencil cursor to the right of DO and add <actuator.movement> When done you should have WHEN <sensor.eyes> DO <actuator.movement>
Step.MouseText: Now click on the plus sign to the right of DO and add <actuator.movement> When done you should have WHEN <sensor.eyes> DO <actuator.movement>

value.string: Теперь щелкни на знак ПЛЮС справа от ДЕЛАТЬ и добавь <actuator.movement> У тебя должно получиться Когда <sensor.eyes> Делать <actuator.movement>

Step.TouchText: Now tap on the plus sign to the right of DO and add <actuator.movement> When done you should have WHEN <sensor.eyes> DO <actuator.movement>

Step.GamepadText: At the plus next to <actuator.movement> add <selector.towardclosest> When done you should have WHEN <sensor.eyes> DO <actuator.movement><selector.towardclosest>
Step.MouseText: At the plus next to <actuator.movement> add <selector.towardclosest> When done you should have WHEN <sensor.eyes> DO <actuator.movement><selector.towardclosest>

value.string: Щелкни на ПЛЮС после <actuator.movement>, добавь <selector.towardclosest> У тебя должно получиться Когда <sensor.eyes> Делать <actuator.movement><selector.towardclosest>

Step.TouchText: At the plus next to <actuator.movement> add <selector.towardclosest> When done you should have WHEN <sensor.eyes> DO <actuator.movement><selector.towardclosest>

Step.GamepadText: Okay, now we can play the game and see what happens.
Step.MouseText: Okay, now we can play the game and see what happens.

value.string: Oкей, теперь запусти игру и посмотри, что получилось.

Step.TouchText: Okay, now we can play the game and see what happens.

Step.GamepadText:
Okay, Kodu <kodu> did just what we told him. He went to the nearest object which happens to be a rock <rock>. But what if we want him to go to an apple <apple> instead? This is where we can use a Filter to specify what we want him to look for.
Let's go back to the editor and add an apple filter to Kodu's programming so he just looks for apples <apple>.
Step.MouseText:
Okay, Kodu <kodu> did just what we told him. He went to the nearest object which happens to be a rock <rock>. But what if we want him to go to an apple <apple> instead? This is where we can use a Filter to specify what we want him to look for.
Let's go back to the editor and add an apple filter to Kodu's programming so he just looks for apples <apple>.

value.string:
Kodu <kodu> сделал именно то, что ты ему сказал. Он переместился к ближайшему объекту, который оказался камнем <rock>. Но что если мы хотим, чтобы Kodu двигался к яблоку <apple>? Этот тот случай, когда можно использовать фильтр, чтобы уточнить, что именно должен искать Kodu.
Давай вернемся в режим редактирования и добавим фильтр, чтобы Kodu искал только яблоки <apple>.

Step.TouchText:
Okay, Kodu <kodu> did just what we told him. He went to the nearest object which happens to be a rock <rock>. But what if we want him to go to an apple <apple> instead? This is where we can use a Filter to specify what we want him to look for.
Let's go back to the editor and add an apple filter to Kodu's programming so he just looks for apples <apple>.

Step.GamepadText: In the space next to the sight sensor <sensor.eyes> add <filter.fruit> The apple can be found in the objects group <group.objects>. When done you should have WHEN <sensor.eyes><filter.fruit> DO <actuator.movement><selector.towardclosest>
Step.MouseText: In the space next to the sight sensor <sensor.eyes> add <filter.fruit> The apple can be found in the objects group <group.objects>. When done you should have WHEN <sensor.eyes><filter.fruit> DO <actuator.movement><selector.towardclosest>

value.string: Щелкни на ПЛЮСе после <sensor.eyes> и добавь <filter.fruit>. Яблоко можно найти в группе Объекты <group.objects>. У тебя должно получиться Когда <sensor.eyes><filter.fruit> Делать <actuator.movement><selector.towardclosest>

Step.TouchText: In the space next to the sight sensor <sensor.eyes> add <filter.fruit> The apple can be found in the objects group <group.objects>. When done you should have WHEN <sensor.eyes><filter.fruit> DO <actuator.movement><selector.towardclosest>

Step.GamepadText: Okay, now we can play the game again and see what happens.
Step.MouseText: Okay, now we can play the game again and see what happens.

value.string: Теперь можно запустить игру и посмотреть, что получилось.

Step.TouchText: Okay, now we can play the game again and see what happens.

Step.GamepadText:
Yeah! Kodu <kodu> found the apple <apple>. Using filters we can be even more specific than that. Notice that the apple <apple> Kodu <kodu>went to was green.
Let's add another filter so Kodu <kodu> only looks for red apples <apple>.
Step.MouseText:
Yeah! Kodu <kodu> found the apple <apple>. Using filters we can be even more specific than that. Notice that the apple <apple> Kodu <kodu>went to was green.
Let's add another filter so Kodu <kodu> only looks for red apples <apple>.

value.string:
Ух ты! Kodu <kodu> действительно нашел яблоко <apple>. Можно использовать фильтры, чтобы сузить круг поиска. Обрати внимание, что яблоко <apple>, к которому двигался Kodu <kodu>, было зеленым.
Давай добавим другой фильтр, чтобы Kodu <kodu> искал только красные яблоки <apple>.

Step.TouchText:
Yeah! Kodu <kodu> found the apple <apple>. Using filters we can be even more specific than that. Notice that the apple <apple> Kodu <kodu>went to was green.
Let's add another filter so Kodu <kodu> only looks for red apples <apple>.

Step.GamepadText: In the space next to the apple filter <filter.fruit> add <filter.red>. The red filter <filter.red> can be found in the colors group <group.colors>. When done you should have WHEN <sensor.eyes><filter.fruit><filter.red> DO <actuator.movement><selector.towardclosest>
Step.MouseText: In the space next to the apple filter <filter.fruit> add <filter.red>. The red filter <filter.red> can be found in the colors group <group.colors>. When done you should have WHEN <sensor.eyes><filter.fruit><filter.red> DO <actuator.movement><selector.towardclosest>

value.string: Щелкни по ПЛЮСу справа от яблока <filter.fruit> и добавь <filter.red>. Фильтр <filter.red> можно найти в группе <group.colors>. У тебя должно получиться Когда <sensor.eyes><filter.fruit><filter.red> Делать <actuator.movement><selector.towardclosest>

Step.TouchText: In the space next to the apple filter <filter.fruit> add <filter.red>. The red filter <filter.red> can be found in the colors group <group.colors>. When done you should have WHEN <sensor.eyes><filter.fruit><filter.red> DO <actuator.movement><selector.towardclosest>

Step.GamepadText: Okay, now we can play the game once again and see what happens.
Step.MouseText: Okay, now we can play the game once again and see what happens.

value.string: Теперь можно снова запустить игру и посмотреть, что получилось.

Step.TouchText: Okay, now we can play the game once again and see what happens.

Step.GamepadText: Hey we're done. Kodu <kodu> found the red apple <apple> and now you know how to use filters when programming your characters. Explore the menus to see what other useful filters you can find.
Step.MouseText: Hey we're done. Kodu <kodu> found the red apple <apple> and now you know how to use filters when programming your characters. Explore the menus to see what other useful filters you can find.

value.string: Эй, мы закончили. Kodu <kodu> нашел красное яблоко <apple>, и теперь ты знаешь, как использовать фильтры при программировании персонажей. Поброди по меню, поищи другие полезные фильтры, попробуй их использовать.

Step.TouchText: Hey we're done. Kodu <kodu> found the red apple <apple> and now you know how to use filters when programming your characters. Explore the menus to see what other useful filters you can find.
